title: Ask Steve, Things Black People Say, Nicknames, Pre-Relations Tips and more.
itunes:title: Ask Steve, Things Black People Say, Nicknames, Pre-Relations Tips and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are L.I.V.E. baby and that is an akonym (acronym). In the words of Tupac Shakur, "How Do You Want It?" What are the things black people say when they give directions? Do you ever say mean things under your breath to your neighbor or nah? We have the stuff people do when nobody is around. Fool #2 has questions just for Steve. Ever not know someone's government name but know their nickname? Want incredible relations? Should work ever be done while on vacation? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells us about the tools God equipped him with that prepared him for the fight that was coming his way and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
